name: One Day I'll be a Flower
name_original: One Day I'll be a Flower
description:
In "One Day I'll be A Flower" you take control of a fresh young seedling growing in a flower pot in the alps that tries to grow a beautiful Flower.

Collect sun orbs in a snake-esque action game, grow leaves and manage your sugar-resources in order to gain all 7 difficult achievements!

You can also visit the game's Ludum-Dare-Page!

The game was made using the *awesome* Love2d (aka LÖVE) framework. Sound effects were generated using bfxr (http://www.bfxr.net/) and the "music" was made using Bosca Ceoil (http://boscaceoil.net/)
